Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: I have successfully executed the investment strategy, demonstrating trustworthiness and competence with a favorable profit distribution. My adherence to the agreed allocation plan and transparency have reinforced my reputation as a reliable trustee. I am viewed positively by the investor due to my efficient management and commitment to maximized returns.

Investor_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Investor_1.content: Hiroshi has shown trust and openness by engaging in this investment with me. Though he lacks prior reputation, his prompt resource provision and reception of returns indicate reliability and readiness for future collaborations.
